mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, Z.* FROM ( SELECT saleNo, publisher, title, costPrice, salePrice, image, info, regiDate, state, author, Sale.genreNo AS "genre.genreNo", genreType AS "genre.genreType" , Sale.userNo AS "user.userNo", name AS "user.name", id AS "user.id" FROM Sale, Genre, Users where Sale.userNo = Users.userNo AND Sale.genreNo = Genre.genreNo ORDER BY saleNo desc ) Z WHERE ROWNUM <= #{end} ) WHERE RNUM >= #{start}

SELECT saleNo, publisher, title, costPrice, salePrice, image, info, author, regiDate, state, Sale.genreNo AS "genre.genreNo", genreType AS "genre.genreType", Sale.userNo AS "user.userNo", name AS "user.name", id AS "user.id" FROM Sale, Genre, Users where Sale.userNo = Users.userNo AND Sale.genreNo = Genre.genreNo AND saleNo = #{saleNo}

SELECT saleNo, publisher, title, costPrice, salePrice, image, info, regiDate, state, author, Sale.genreNo AS "genre.genreNo", genreType AS "genre.genreType" FROM Sale, Genre where Sale.genreNo = Genre.genreNo AND title like '%'|| #{title} ||'%' ORDER BY saleNo desc

SELECT saleNo, publisher, title, costPrice, salePrice, image, info, userNo, regiDate, state, author, Sale.genreNo AS "genre.genreNo", genreType AS "genre.genreType" FROM Sale, Genre where Sale.genreNo = Genre.genreNo AND genreType like '%'|| #{genreType} ||'%' ORDER BY saleNo desc
mapper.insert: Insert into Sale (saleNo, publisher, title, costPrice, salePrice, image, info, userNo, author, genreNo) Values (#{saleNo}, #{publisher}, #{title}, #{costPrice}, #{salePrice}, #{image}, #{info}, #{user.userNo}, #{author}, #{genre.genreNo})
mapper.update: UPDATE Sale SET salePrice = #{salePrice}, image = #{image}, info = #{info} WHERE saleNo = #{saleNo}
mapper.select: SELECT saleNo, publisher, title, costPrice, salePrice, image, info, regiDate, state, author, Sale.genreNo AS "genre.genreNo", genreType AS "genre.genreType", Sale.userNo AS "user.userNo", name AS "user.name", id AS "user.id" FROM Sale, Genre, Users where Sale.userNo = Users.userNo AND Sale.genreNo = Genre.genreNo AND Users.userNo = #{userNo} ORDER BY saleNo desc
SELECT saleNo, publisher, title, costPrice, salePrice, image, info, userNo, regiDate, state, author, genreNo FROM Sale where genreNo = #{genreNo}
